official_title: To extend retroactively until January 1, 1996, the prior suspension of duty on L-alanyl - L-proline, also known as Ala Pro.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on L-alanyl-L-proline (also known as Ala Pro).

titles.title: To extend retroactively until January 1, 1996, the prior suspension of duty on L-alanyl - L-proline, also known as Ala Pro.
